The on-site GHG emissions of diesel consumption for the mechanical hoeing of land was defined as the following formula Eq. (10).
(10)NGS
t = EF D × QDS
t × 10 −3 where NGS
t indicates the carbon emissions of the diesel consumption for site preparation in the t th year (Gg C); EF D indicates the diesel carbon emission factor, 0.86 t C·t −1 [ 8]; and QDS
t indicates the total amount of diesel consumption for the site preparation in the t th year (t).
